Class FormatterUtils.Row

    FormatterUtils

    public static class FormatterUtils.Row
extends java.lang.Object
    Row, which consists a list of cells. 
       ----------------------
   | xxxx | yyyy | zzzz | <- a list of cells
   ----------------------
                 ^
                 |------- separator: "|"
